[[President]] of [[Hanchen Group]] |networth = |alma_mater = [[Zhengzhou University of Light Industry]] |website = |parents = |spouse = |children = |signature = |religion = }} '''Yunfeng Han (éé²å³°)''' (born October 9, 1959) is a [[Dutch people|Dutch]]/[[Chinese people|Chinese]] [[businessperson]]. He is the [[President]] of the [[Hanchen Group]] and a successful [[entrepreneur]] in the [[tobacco industry]]. Han is also the founder of Hanchen Agriculture business cluster in [[Hong Kong]] and [[Cambodia]]. Before Han has been acting as the [[Managing Director]] of the Golden Leaf International B.V. in the Netherlands. His long career in the tobacco industry started in [[China National Tobacco Corp]]oration. Currently Yunfeng Han is working on a large-scale agricultural development program in [[Southeast Asia]].Hanchen Group: [http://www.hanchengroup.com/userlist/hanchen/text-1394.html "Profile of the Hanchen Management Team"], Hanchen Group website, accessed December 16, 2010. == Source == {{reflist}} {{Persondata | NAME = Han, Yunfeng | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = October 9, 1959 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Henan]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Han, Yunfeng}} [[Category:1959 births]] [[Category:Chinese businesspeople]] [[Category:Living people]]
